english.segment1: Not to us oh God. But to Your name all glory. We give thanks and praise. To You alone forever
english.segment2: Praise Him all the earth. All creation bows to You. Nations stand in awe. He is the king of glory
english.segment3: To you oh Lord. You reign in Heaven and on the earth. To You alone. As the Earth is filled with knowledge. Of the Lord
english.segment4: Call upon His name. The orphans and the widows. He'll lift You up again. And shower You with mercy
english.segment5: Bless You all my soul. Robed with strength and majesty. The Lion and the Lamb. Togethercome and worship. To You oh Lord. You reign in heaven and on earth. To You alone. As the Earth is filled with Your wonder
english.segment6: To you oh Lord. You reign in Heaven and on the earth. To You alone. As the Earth is filled with knowledge. Of the Lord
english.segment7: All to You. Both now and evermore
english.segment8: Come and drink again. Be filled with living water. Call upon His name. He is the King of glory
